text: Mairead Maguire (born 27 January 1944), also known as Mairead Corrigan Maguire and formerly as Mair√©ad Corrigan, is a peace activist from Northern Ireland. She co-founded, with Betty Williams and Ciaran McKeown, the Women for Peace, which later became the Community for Peace People. Maguire and Williams were awarded the 1976 Nobel Peace Prize. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Activists from Belfast
title: Mairead Maguire
